meanings.definition: The act of removing or altering material considered vulgar or offensive.
meanings.sent1: The bowdlerizations in the movie made it suitable for children to watch.
meanings.sent2: The bowdlerizations of the book made it more appropriate for a younger audience.
meanings.sent3: The bowdlerizations of the stand-up comedy routine took away its edge but kept the humor.
meanings.sent4: Her bowdlerizations of the original painting transformed it into a family-friendly artwork.
meanings.sent5: The bowdlerizations of the song lyrics made them safe for radio play.

meanings.definition: The result of censoring or sanitizing content for a particular audience.
meanings.sent1: The bowdlerizations of the film ensured it met the TV network's standards.
meanings.sent2: After the bowdlerizations, the content was deemed appropriate for all viewers.
meanings.sent3: The bowdlerizations of the novel made it more suitable for a conservative readership.
meanings.sent4: The bowdlerizations of the play turned it into a family-friendly production.
meanings.sent5: His bowdlerizations of the speech removed any controversial elements.
